bug.author: michalmar
bug.summary: Export to CustomVision service works only for Classification
bug.description: I was not able to export to CustomVision for Detection - it ends up in classification regardless of project type selection

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/michalmar>@michalmar</denchmark-link> . Right now the dropdown contains domains for both classification projects and object detection projects. The 2nd half of list starting at are object classification domains. Please try selecting one of these in combination with project type and it should work as expected. We're working on cleaning this up so it is more clear.

thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wbreza>@wbreza</denchmark-link> ! I just missed that there are two domains while the first leads to Classification and the second to Detection. It is working now!
